header.gameNote: CAA Men's Championship - 1st Round AT RICHMOND VA

article.headline: Delaware 60, Drexel 51
article.story: RICHMOND, Va. (AP) -- Marc Egerson scored 15 points and hit 7 of 8 free throws in the final 4:43 Friday night, leading Delaware to a 60-51 victory against Drexel in the first round of the Colonial Athletic Association tournament. The Blue Hens (14-16) moved on to a meeting with North Carolina-Wilmington in the quarterfinals on Saturday. Drexel finished 12-19 and lost 12 of its last 15 games. The Blue Hens led 28-25 at the intermission and throughout the second half. Drexel cut the margin to 54-51 with 1:30 left on a 3-pointer by Gerald Colds, but Jim Ledsome blocked Frank Elegar's jumper on the Dragons' next possession with 30 seconds left. Egerson then hit two free throws and Ledsome had a four-point play to seal it. Herb Courtney added 14 points for the Blue Hens, and Alphonso Dawson had 13. Elegar was Drexel's only scorer in double figures. He had 15.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
